description:
It's a simple game where you draw your favorite shapes on the screen and aim for the goal.

There are various floors and gimmicks on the stage, and the characters are not only chicks, but also sparrows, penguins, etc.
There are so many characters with different sizes and characteristics that it's fun to watch!
It's fun to roll! It's a game.

=== You can also create your own original stage! ===
Also includes the ability to create your own original stage!

[how to play]
・Create blocks and lines freely by operating gyro of Joy-Con™ or tracing the screen.
・If you hold down the button, you can create a heavy stone statue of a chick.
- Hit the character with blocks and statues and aim for the flag.
・Build a bridge with wire where there is no floor.

Unlimited number of times! It's okay no matter how many times you fail
If the conditions are met, you will be able to select a new character.
name: Piyokoro
intro:
